title: Divine Diamond Floral Haaram Set with Jhumkas
materials: South Sea Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish finish.
features: Intricate floral design showcasing a traditional Telugu floral motif. The Haaram features a central floral pendant adorned with an emerald. The Jhumkas echo the floral theme, culminating in lustrous South Sea pearls. Delicate diamond setting emphasizes the brilliance of each stone.
colors: Predominantly white (diamonds) with golden accents (gold setting)
contrasted by the vibrant green of the emerald and the deep red of the ruby. Creamy white pearls add a touch of elegance.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (పెళ్లి)
and festive celebrations. Also a statement piece for modern formal events.
description: A harmonious blend of traditional South Indian design and modern aesthetics. The exceptional craftsmanship and high-quality materials ensure a piece that will be treasured for generations. The floral design symbolizes prosperity and beauty, making it a meaningful heirloom. The Hyderabadi Polish enhances the gold's luster, adding to its luxurious appeal.
